TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGainLo.description: Amount of unrealized holding gain (loss) recognized in the income statement for investments in debt and equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

ClosedPortfolioAndBeneficialInterestLast.label: Closed Portfolio and Beneficial Interest, Last-of-Layer, Amortized Cost
ClosedPortfolioAndBeneficialInterestLast.description: Amortized cost of closed portfolio of prepayable financial asset and beneficial interest secured by prepayable financial instrument, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is last layer expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.label: Equity Securities without Readily Determinable Fair Value, Amount
EquitySecuritiesWithoutReadilyDeterminab.description: Amount of investment in equity security without readily determinable fair value.

IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquit.label: Income Tax Effects Allocated Directly to Equity, Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle
IncomeTaxEffectsAllocatedDirectlyToEquit.description: Amount of cumulative tax effect on beginning retained earnings from change in accounting principle.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.description: Amount of realized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedGa.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Realized Loss
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleRealizedLo.description: Amount of realized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedGain.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Gain
EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedGain.description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

InterestRevenueExpenseNet.label: Interest Revenue (Expense), Net
InterestRevenueExpenseNet.description: Amount of interest revenue (income derived from investments in debt securities and on cash and cash equivalents) net of interest expense (cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest).

PrepayableFinancialAssetClosedPortfolioL.label: Prepayable Financial Asset Closed Portfolio, Last-of-Layer, Amortized Cost
PrepayableFinancialAssetClosedPortfolioL.description: Amortized cost of closed portfolio of prepayable financial asset, used to designate hedging relationship in which hedged item is last layer expected to be remaining at end of hedging relationship.

OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Adjustment from AOCI for Amortization of Gain (Loss), after Tax
OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Adjustment from AOCI for Amortization of Gain (Loss), Tax
OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) on adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).
